9.ara-name: كتاب الحج عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Aishah narrated that :the Messenger of Allah said: "Five are Fawasiq which may be killed in the Haram: the mouse, the scorpion, the crow, the kite, and the barbed dog

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا يَقْتُلُ الْمُحْرِمُ مِنَ الدَّوَابِّ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About What Creatures The Muhrim May Kill
